name: The Thief Trap
description:
ActionsInputMove Forward / BackwardW / S
Turn Left / RightA / DRunHold ShiftCharge Teleport DashHold SpaceCancel Teleport Dash (while charging)QInteractEStrafe Left / RightZ / XPauseEsc

You have been invited by Lord Craymer to steal one of the largest Diamonds ever known. 

Use your Teleport Dash to help you sneak around guards and into hard-to-reach areas. Learn the environment and plan your route. 

But beware, something isn't quite right about all this...

Uncover the truth while exploring the environment and then escape with the Diamond and all the loot you can find. 

Be prepared, it won't be easy.

Created in 14 days for LowRezJam 2021.
